body:
I'm HappyCat and I love minecraft I came across this awesome server called The Avicus Network about a year ago and decided to play it, after that it got boring and I hated the Avicore Update so I quit Avicus but then I realised it isn't that bad and started to play more! After that I discovered more...
Anyway my names, HappyCat and I want you guys to know more about me please ask away!!
body_tagged:

title: Hey A V I C U S

replies.body:
My little sister,
Why did you play Avicus when you were banned from minecraft?
